body:
# Accident Investigation Report 8/2012

  
MAIB Report on the investigation of the collision between Rigid-hulled inflatable boat Morfil and passenger vessel Sun Clipper by Blackfriars Road Bridge, The River Thames on 1 June 2011. Report No 8/2012. Published 18 April 2012.

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (4,693.59 kb)
